item.title: Implement Newsletter Subscription Using Staticman
item.description: In this article, I am going to share how you can set up a newsletter subscription using Staticman. No need to use third party newsletter subscription services. Collecting data in static sites or serverless sites(with POST request) is a hassle because you don’t have a server to receive POST requests and store data.
